edge: Adam Warlock, a Sovereign warrior created by High Priestess Ayesha, attacks the Guardians of the Galaxy at their new headquarters on Knowhere.
The Guardians of the Galaxy are critically wounded when attacked by Adam Warlock, but Rocket's wounds prove more severe due to a kill switch embedded in him by Orgocorp.
Orgocorp's med-packs are ineffective at healing Rocket's wounds due to a kill switch embedded in him by the organization.
Rocket was found as a baby raccoon and experimented on by the High Evolutionary, who sought to enhance and anthropomorphize animal lifeforms.
The otter Lylla was also found and experimented on by the High Evolutionary alongside Rocket.
The walrus Teefs was also found and experimented on by the High Evolutionary alongside Rocket.
The rabbit Floor was also found and experimented on by the High Evolutionary alongside Rocket.
As Rocket's intelligence grew, the High Evolutionary became envious and planned to harvest his brain for further research before exterminating Batch 89.
The High Evolutionary was impressed by Lylla's growing intelligence and used it to fix a defect in later Humanimal batches.
The High Evolutionary was impressed by Teefs' growing intelligence and used it to fix a defect in later Humanimal batches.
The High Evolutionary was impressed by Floor's growing intelligence and used it to fix a defect in later Humanimal batches.
Rocket attempted to free Lylla and his fellow Batch 89 test subjects from the High Evolutionary's clutches, but he was mocked and Lylla was killed.
When Rocket showed grief over Lylla's death, the High Evolutionary killed her as a lesson to the other test subjects.
enemy relationship; High Evolutionary's henchmen killed Rocket's friends and Rocket mauled High Evolutionary in revenge
member relationship; alternate version of Gamora joined the Ravagers
follower relationship; Ayesha and Adam followed the Guardians to find Rocket at the request of High Evolutionary
protector relationship; Drax tricked Mantis into pursuing Quill's group and Gamora saved Rocket from Adam and War Pig
barrier relationship; Nebula was forced to wait outside by guards due to her cybernetic enhancements
team relationship; Quill and Groot entered Arête together
rescue relationship; Nebula, Drax, and Mantis boarded to rescue Quill and Groot
possessor relationship; Theel had the High Evolutionary's code
friendship relationship; Rocket flatlined before Quill and Groot used the code
Quill nearly dies trying to reach Knowhere, but is saved by Adam, whom Groot had rescued earlier from Arête's destruction.
Groot had rescued Adam earlier from Arête's destruction.

node_2: high evolutionary's next batch of test subjects
edge: Drax, Nebula, and Mantis encounter the High Evolutionary's next batch of test subjects, genetically modified humanoid children.
The High Evolutionary's crew mutiny,
Rocket discovers imprisoned animals on the ship and is confronted by the High Evolutionary,
The other Guardians stage a rescue, leading to a battle against the High Evolutionary's forces.
Drax, Nebula, and Mantis encounter the High Evolutionary's next batch of test subjects, genetically modified humanoid children, before being captured.
Adam saved Groot, whom Groot had rescued earlier from Arête's destruction.
Quill decides to leave the Guardians.
Quill names Rocket as the new captain.
Mantis embarks on a journey of self-discovery with the Abilisks.
Gamora rejoins the Ravagers.
Nebula and Drax remain on Knowhere to raise the rescued children.
Phyla (one of the rescued children) becomes a part of the new Guardians.
